Detailed Description

Inner class to C4DView which handles the mouse events
Author:
Helge Preuss <scout@hyperspace-travel.de>
Todo:
move all state variables concerning mouse handling from C4DView into this class and adjust the accessors accordingly
Todo:
can I get rid of parent? It's annoying to prefix every call to C4DView member functions with parent->

Double click event handler.

Stops animation, if running, or resets transformation values to default
